docs.snippet: Carroll’s former neighbors in Medfield, Mass., fondly recalled what he did for the town when he lived there, and some said they would even root for him in the Super Bowl....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carroll’s former neighbors in Medfield, Mass., fondly recalled what he did for the town when he lived there, and some said they would even root for him in the Super Bowl.
docs.abstract: Seattle Seahawks coach Pete Carroll has cadre of unlikely fans in of Medfield, Mass, where his family lived during his tenure as New England Patriots coach.

headline.main: Pete Carroll Has a Fan Club Deep in Patriots Territory
headline.print_headline: Carroll Has Fan Club Deep in Patriots Territory

byline.contributor: Melissa Hoppert contributed reporting from Phoenix.
